languages.text: {n}При взгляде на ксеноса Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью.{/n} "Как... ярко... Слепящие цвета не дают собранно мыслить... Они окутывают восставших плебсов, пытаются окутать и нас".
{n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."
languages.original_text: {n}При взгляде на ксеноса Кассия прикрывает глаза ладонью.{/n} "Как... ярко... Слепящие цвета не дают собранно мыслить... Они окутывают восставших плебсов, пытаются окутать и нас".

{n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

languages.text: {n}カシアは異種族を見つめ、口を覆った。{/n}「こんな…鮮やかな…眩しすぎて集中できません…それは反抗的な群衆を飲み込もうとしていて、あたくしたちも同じように飲み込もうとしているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは異種族を見つめ、口を覆った。{/n}「こんな…鮮やかな…眩しすぎて集中できません…それは反抗的な群衆を飲み込もうとしていて、あたくしたちも同じように飲み込もうとしているのです」

languages.text: {n}Cassia observe le xénos et porte sa main à ses lèvres.{/n} « Elles sont si intenses... Ces couleurs sont aveuglantes, j'ai du mal à me concentrer... Elles consument la foule rebelle et essaient de nous consumer à notre tour. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia observe le xénos et porte sa main à ses lèvres.{/n} « Elles sont si intenses... Ces couleurs sont aveuglantes, j'ai du mal à me concentrer... Elles consument la foule rebelle et essaient de nous consumer à notre tour. »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅看着眼前的异形，捂住了嘴。{/n}“太……明亮了，这些刺眼的颜色让我无法集中注意力……它们在吞噬那些反抗的乌合之众，还在试图吞噬我们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅看着眼前的异形，捂住了嘴。{/n}“太……明亮了，这些刺眼的颜色让我无法集中注意力……它们在吞噬那些反抗的乌合之众，还在试图吞噬我们。”

languages.text: {n}Cassia mira a la xenos y se tapa la boca.{/n} «Cuánto... brillo. Sus colores ciegan tanto la vista que cuesta concentrarse... Absorben el gentío y amenazan con consumirnos a nosotros».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia mira a la xenos y se tapa la boca.{/n} «Cuánto... brillo. Sus colores ciegan tanto la vista que cuesta concentrarse... Absorben el gentío y amenazan con consumirnos a nosotros».

languages.text: {n}Cassia blickt den Xenos an und bedeckt ihren Mund.{/n} "So ... bunt ... Bei all diesen blendenden Farben kann ich mich kaum konzentrieren ... Sie verschlingen den trotzigen Pöbel und versuchen, auch uns zu verschlingen."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia blickt den Xenos an und bedeckt ihren Mund.{/n} "So ... bunt ... Bei all diesen blendenden Farben kann ich mich kaum konzentrieren ... Sie verschlingen den trotzigen Pöbel und versuchen, auch uns zu verschlingen."

languages.text: {n}Cassia, zenolara bakıp eliyle ağzını kapatıyor.{/n} "Çok parlak... Bu kör edici renkler yüzünden odaklanmakta zorlanıyorum... Bu serkeş ayaktakımını tüketiyor, bizi de tüketmeye çalışıyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia looks at the xenos and covers her mouth.{/n} "So... bright... All these blinding colours make it hard to focus... They are consuming the defiant rabble and trying to consume us."
